text: Jon Peters was a high school pitcher from Brenham, Texas. He was famous for 53 straight wins. He stood 6'2" 190 lbs. He was well known while in high school. He was the first high school baseball player to be featured on the cover of Sports Illustrated. He played at Brenham High School. He attended Texas A&M; and Blinn College. ==References== ==External links== * JonPeters.org official website Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Baseball players from Texas Category:Blinn Buccaneers baseball players Category:People from Brenham, Texas Category:Texas A&M; Aggies baseball players https://www.si.com/mlb/2019/06/28/jon-peters-superkid-1989 https://www.houstonchronicle.com/sports/texas-sports- nation/college/article/Once-Superkid-Jon-Peters-opens-up-on- struggles-12975735.php https://www.baseballamerica.com/stories/where-are-they- now-jon-peters/
title: Jon Peters (pitcher)
